column4: Also the lightest OS you can suggest to me, please do :-) It's to get someone up and running for basic web use, nothing fancy.
If this is way too old for any linux distro that's fine, just thought I'd chance it :-)
if you want to stick with *buntu, then the unofficial but excellent lubuntu is "lightest"
if lubuntu doesn't work out for you, go to Distrowatch and look at all their listing for a light weight linux
